ygData.subject: RE: Jackalstock
ygData.msgSnippet: What about a torch?  So... would a mob with two torches stop attacking all-together??? Kit ... From: kim@stormhaven.org [mailto:kim@stormhaven.org] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
What about a torch? So... would a mob with two torches stop attacking
all-together???

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Friday, February 04, 2000 2:01 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Jackalstock


From: <kim@...>

On Fri, 4 Feb 2000, Robert Maze wrote:
>
> Hmmm since those are ALL/ALL and bards can dual wield their fists when
> punching with a mandolin/lute, can the same be said for monks? I have an

You don't dual wield when holding an instrument. The
instrument prevents your second hand from attacking, just like
a shield (statements by Verant about needing magical
instruments to hit magical mobs notwithstanding).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
